mil7.8.3:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘chattassa tini angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani tini angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.8.3:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kilesanam upari muddhani carena bhavitabbam.
mil7.8.3:1.4: Idam, maharaja, chattassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.8.3:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, chattam muddhanupatthambham hoti;
mil7.8.3:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena yoniso manasikarupatthambhena bhavitabbam.
mil7.8.3:2.3: Idam, maharaja, chattassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.8.3:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, chattam vatatapameghavutthiyo patihanati;
mil7.8.3:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena nanavidhaditthiputhusamanabrahmananam matavata-tividhaggisantapakilesavutthiyo patihantabba.
mil7.8.3:3.3: Idam, maharaja, chattassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
